extendedInfo.description: In the darkness under a starry sky, you awake to find a whole new world around you. The night, previously scary and mysterious, now seems familiar and comforting. The vampire who turned you is trying to get you to join his underground vampire clan. You, however, have other plans...Start as a lowly vampire and become the most powerful vampire lord by bringing in other vampires into your clan and spreading your influence throughout the city in Vampires Liveâ¢. Fight zombies from hit title Zombies Liveâ¢ as well in the most immersive massively multiplayer online game ever!FEATURES:- Massively Multiplayer ONLINE Undead Game for Android, iPhone and iPod Touch!- FREE updates with new missions, abilities, slaves, and more!- Fight both zombies and vampires LIVE- Strengthen your vampires with the strongest physical abilities, sensory abilities, and transformations- Feed your thirst for blood by acquiring slaves to gather blood for you- Bring your friends into your coven to make it stronger- Perform numerous dark missions- Enjoy gorgeous graphics- Enjoy vampire sounds- Loot rare items and abilities- Get real time updates- Comment on other vampires or zombies- Broadcast messages to your clan- Simple and easy-to-use tap interface- ...and much, much more!PLEASE NOTE:- This is an online game only.Storm8 is the #1 Mobile Social Game Developer on Android, iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad. Use of this application is governed by the Storm8 Terms of Service. Collection and use of data are subject to Storm8's Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at www.storm8.com/terms and www.storm8.com/privacyPlease note that Vampires Liveâ¢ is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to the Google Play Store, tap the Menu button, select Settings > Use PIN for purchase. Then, set up the four-digit PIN on the option below. In addition, Vampires Liveâ¢ may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have access to your information through such services.

reviews.title: Tips
reviews.comment: Now cash is king in this game.  Buy slaves as soon and as much as you can. To have the abilities you need you have to have a good cash flow. Also find a good Atm or three, Try not to attack one person more than three times. Enjoy Invite me and I\'ll be happy to help:) Im maxed sorry but add my Zombie cnx666
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Good game please add stronger clan is better clan.  5pxgy5 needs some more slaves they start getting outragesly priced fast makes you choose between Blood flow and defending your self
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Clan Code: 3UCYJH  I really enjoy. The only suggestion that\'d make it outstanding is being able to make and customize my own character/avatar/vampire. Still a fun app nevertheless.
reviews.author: Devyn Samios-Uy

reviews.title: QQHAXB
reviews.comment: 600+ clan size and looking for more add QQHAXB for a great teammate in game also download free app palringo and join our clan room called (the dead rabbits) so we can help you build a strong account. And help with anything else we can.
reviews.author: Johnathon Yanochik

reviews.title: Really epic
reviews.comment: This game is amazing and fun really there are no words for it it passes time to new people though you want to build up your clan size you will survive better in numbers mine is DK2Y2M I am always looking for new recruits :)
reviews.author: Alex Taylor

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Looks addicting.  Too small on my Galaxy Note 10.1 but will probably be great on my phone.  Clan code NCPR2A
reviews.author: Regina Brisben

reviews.title: Old but Loved
reviews.comment: I had this same game in several social medias like FB and MS.  I now love it here. Though it could have a better clan system. Looking for clan members, my code is: F75Y7K.

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Nqmh39 I\'m in need of clan members and I accept all and will Broadcast  when needed add nqmh39 please pull a screenshot capability for those who cannot screen  shot

reviews.title: To die for! :)
reviews.comment: My clan code is: 47NT97. in this game you can have slaves, fight zombies from Zombies Live, gain blood to buy enhancements (blood is like money), and build your clan (this is why you need a clan code; you will find out more about it in the game).

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: I do like it. But the broadcast board does not work. If it did i would keep the game so ill give it a few weeks to be fixed otherwise an uninstall and will never play again. Btw storm8 if you care to read and fix the game my code is e5xxg3.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Add XC7FFV. Get your blood flow up as fast as you can, if you wait it gets hard. Do missions with chance of loot if you can\'t find an item to do higher missions.

reviews.comment: Love this game.. But the constant lag is driving me crazy! Freezes Everytime I Do anything now... Have to force close constantly :(

reviews.comment: The game used to be way better than what it is now, but it still provides a good source of entertainment for awhile. NQRFN9

reviews.title: I can\'t describe it...
reviews.comment: Its the best game on my phone! I love it. Im an Atm and I have like 30 billion in the bank and my income won\'t let it go down. Im giving away free blood in Vampires Live so if you wanna look me up my code is PWDT43.
